languages.text: "Бренная плоть... слаба, но вера моя — несокрушима. Я — вершащая длань Его! Я... кара!"

traits.locale_text: "Бренная плоть... слаба, но вера моя — несокрушима. Я — вершащая длань Его! Я... кара!"

languages.text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"
languages.original_text: "Бренная плоть... слаба, но вера моя — несокрушима. Я — вершащая длань Его! Я... кара!"

traits.locale_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"
"My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

"My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"
"My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

languages.text: «Mi carne mortal... es débil, pero mi fe es inquebrantable. ¡Soy Su mano castigadora! Su... ¡castigo!».
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi carne mortal... es débil, pero mi fe es inquebrantable. ¡Soy Su mano castigadora! Su... ¡castigo!».

languages.text: 「私の朽ちゆく肉体は…弱くとも、私の信仰が折れることはない。私は神の懲罰の手！主の...報復なのだ！」
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の朽ちゆく肉体は…弱くとも、私の信仰が折れることはない。私は神の懲罰の手！主の...報復なのだ！」

languages.text: “我的肉体……软弱不堪，但我的信念坚不可摧。我就是祂的惩罚之手！祂的……复仇！”
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

traits.locale_text: “我的肉体……软弱不堪，但我的信念坚不可摧。我就是祂的惩罚之手！祂的……复仇！”

languages.text: « Ma chair mortelle... est faible, mais ma foi demeure inébranlable. Je suis Son bras vengeur ! L'incarnation... de Son châtiment ! »
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

traits.locale_text: « Ma chair mortelle... est faible, mais ma foi demeure inébranlable. Je suis Son bras vengeur ! L'incarnation... de Son châtiment ! »

languages.text: "Mein sterbliches Fleisch ... ist schwach, aber mein Glaube ist unerschütterlich. Ich bin Seine strafende Hand! Seine ... Vergeltung!"
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein sterbliches Fleisch ... ist schwach, aber mein Glaube ist unerschütterlich. Ich bin Seine strafende Hand! Seine ... Vergeltung!"

languages.text: "Fâni bedenim... Zayıf düşse de inancım sarsılmaz. Ben, O'nun ceza dağıtan eliyim! O'nun... İntikamıyım!"
languages.original_text: "My mortal flesh... is weak, but my faith is unbreakable. I am His punishing hand! His... retribution!"
